definition: (of clothing) made in or consisting of two parts or pieces, a woman's very brief bathing suit
details:
adjective
- (of clothing) made in or consisting of two parts or pieces
= example: (of clothing) made in or consisting of two parts or pieces
noun
- a woman's very brief bathing suit
= synonyms: bikini
- a business suit consisting of a matching jacket and skirt or trousers
= synonyms: two-piece suit, lounge suit
